sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious powershell process starts with base64 encoded commands (e.g. Emotet)
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Markus Neis, Jonhnathan Ribeiro, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, Anton Kutepov, oscd.community

match_context.values: @{EventID=1; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Company=Microsoft Corporation; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; Description=Windows PowerShell; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; ParentCommandLine=cmd.exe /c start /min "" powershell.exe -WindowStyle hidden -NoLogo -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy bypass -EncodedCommand ; RuleName=-; Hashes=MD5=95000560239032BC68B4C2FDFCDEF913,SHA256=D3F8FADE829D2B7BD596C4504A6DAE5C034E789B6A3DEFBE013BDA7D14466677,IMPHASH=741776AACCFC5B71FF59832DCDCACE0F; CommandLine=powershell.exe  -WindowStyle hidden -NoLogo -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy bypass -EncodedCommand ; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800)}

@{EventID=1; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation; IntegrityLevel=High; ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe" /c start /min "" powershell.exe -WindowStyle hidden  -NoLogo -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy bypass -EncodedCommand  ; RuleName=-; Hashes=MD5=95000560239032BC68B4C2FDFCDEF913,SHA256=D3F8FADE829D2B7BD596C4504A6DAE5C034E789B6A3DEFBE013BDA7D14466677,IMPHASH=741776AACCFC5B71FF59832DCDCACE0F; CommandLine=powershell.exe  -WindowStyle hidden  -NoLogo -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy bypass -EncodedCommand  ; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Description=Windows PowerShell}

@{EventID=0; TargetFilename=%USERPROFILE%\AppData\Local\Temp\__PSScriptPolicyTest_aaahn44w.r5e.psm1}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects local user creation on Windows servers, which shouldn't happen in an Active Directory environment. Apply this Sigma Use Case on your Windows server logs and not on your DC logs.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: A Member Was Added to a Security-Enabled Global Group
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects activity when a member is added to a security-enabled global group

match_context.values: @{EventID=4728; MemberSid=S-1-5-21-1015118539-3749460369-599379286-1002; MemberName=-; SubjectUserName=DESKTOP-B0T93D6$; TargetDomainName=DESKTOP-B0T93D6; SubjectDomainName=WORKGROUP; TargetUserName=None; SubjectUserSid=S-1-5-18; TargetSid=S-1-5-21-1015118539-3749460369-599379286-513; PrivilegeList=-; SubjectLogonId=999}

attributes.magic: PE32+ executable (GUI) x86-64, for MS Windows

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered downloader. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET HUNTING SUSPICIOUS Firesale gTLD EXE DL with no Referer June 13 2016
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET HUNTING SUSPICIOUS Firesale gTLD EXE DL with no Referer June 13 2016"; flow:established,to_server; http.uri; content:".exe"; nocase; fast_pattern; http.host; pcre:"/\.(?:s(?:(?:(?:cien|pa)c|it)e|tream)|c(?:l(?:ick|ub)|ountry|ricket)|m(?:(?:aiso|e)n|o(?:bi|m))|p(?:r(?:ess|o)|arty|ink|w)|r(?:e(?:[dn]|view)|acing)|w(?:eb(?:site|cam)|in)|b(?:(?:outiq|l)ue|id)|d(?:ownload|ate|esi)|(?:accountan|hos)t|l(?:o(?:an|l)|ink)|t(?:rade|ech|op)|v(?:oyage|ip)|g(?:dn|b)|online|faith|kim|xyz)(?:\x3a\d{1,5})?$/"; http.header_names; content:!"Referer"; content:!"Cookie"; classtype:trojan-activity; sid:2022896; rev:6; metadata:created_at 2016_06_14, former_category CURRENT_EVENTS, updated_at 2022_05_03;)
alert ( gid:119; sid:279; rev:1; msg:"(http_inspect) invalid status line"; metadata: rule-type preproc; classtype:unknown;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO Executable Retrieved With Minimal HTTP Headers - Potential Second Stage Download
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"ET INFO Executable Retrieved With Minimal HTTP Headers - Potential Second Stage Download"; flowbits:isset,min.gethttp; flow:established,to_client; file_data; content:"MZ"; within:2; content:"PE|00 00|"; distance:0; classtype:bad-unknown; sid:2016538; rev:3; metadata:created_at 2013_03_06, updated_at 2013_03_06;)
